nodes.text: The Magys was a female individual who held the title of Magys, ruling over her people. When her world was devastated in a civil war orchestrated by Haplif of the Agbui under the orders of the Grysk Jixtus, the Magys and two hundred refugees escaped. Their starship came across the planet Rapacc, homeworld of the Paccosh, who gave shelter to the refugees. The Magys, believing that her world was destroyed, wished for her and her people to die in order to pass on to the Beyond in order to heal it.
